This game will work u need new LT Plus flash & new ABGX360 V1.0.4 it will patch ap25 games if ur runnin older versions of ABGX360 V1.0.3 or older ur wastin DL and ur gonna get disc unreadable or black screen on new flash trust me I wasted 2 DL I have benq
